frontmatter.title: How to View Reactive Usage Charges
frontmatter.metaTitle: How to View Reactive Usage Charges
frontmatter.metaDesc: How to View Reactive Usage Charges

pageProps.content:
1. Open the Shopify admin and select "Settings" at the bottom left of the screen

   ![](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-remove-reactive/go-to-settings.png)
2. Select Apps and sales channels![](/blog-assets/Apps_and_sales_channels.png)
3. Select "Live Shopping // Video Replays" sales channel

   ![](/blog-assets/Live-Shopping-and-Video-Replays.png)
4. Under Billing and Usage, you can see your usage charges

   ![](/blog-assets/Billing-and-usage-charges.png)
